Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: initial site overhaul - UI updates, data refactor, remove achievements page

- Updated components: ClubOverview, HistoryTimeline, StadiumInfo, ContactDetails,
  MapPlaceholder, SocialLinks, Footer, GalleryGrid, TopScorers, MobileMenu,
  PlayerCard, PlayerGrid, StaffCard, StaffSection, MainLayout, App
- Refactored data files: contact, gallery, highlights, navigation, players, staff, timeline
- Updated types: contact, gallery, index, player, staff
- Removed achievements page and related components \(MomentsTimeline, TrophyCard, TrophyGrid\)
- Removed trophies data and trophy types
- Added player images: alen-zagric, barkod, bruno-bucci, dalibor-bozac, ilija-lovric, marino-brgic
- Updated team-celebration image

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
